text:
Madison and Fourth Avenues, showing Madison Square, east side looking in a north easterly direction across the Park towards the Madison Square Theater.

 1900.

Madison Square at "Madison and Fourth avenues showing the southeast corner of Madison Square Garden.

Charles L, Ritzmann. 1900.

(1) Madison Ave., Bridge, spans the Harlem River. It connects Manhattan at East 138th Street to the Bronx at 138th Street.

November 10, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from another angle.
August 31, 1926.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bridges - Madison Avenue Bridge - Harlem River.

text:

General View: Looking across roof Madison Square Garden to Metropolitan Life Insurance Company Building. Fourth Avenue and Madison Square Garden.
